dsOverview.title: GATE ASECNA African Daily Precipitation for 1974

summary.p: This dataset contains daily precipitation data for 1974 for stations in several African countries. These data were provided by ASECNA (Agency for Air Traffic Safety in Africa and Madagascar) as part of the GATE experiment.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: MG/ASECNA > Agence pour la Securite de la Navigation Aerienne en Afrique et a Madagascar

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Precipitation > Precipitation Amount
